1.caption_en: Slide outlining multiple use cases for applying the Platform Innovation Kit (PIK), with brief descriptions for each case. Examples include discovering platform opportunities, accelerating projects, scaling platforms, executive alignment, ecosystem strategy, performance optimization, entrepreneurial education, systemizing enterprise innovation, and deal evaluation.
